name: Khan Academy
description: Free unlimited access to video lessons, practice exercises, and test prep for all subjects and grade levels
fullDescription: Khan Academy provides free online education with video lessons and practice exercises covering math, science, humanities, SAT prep, and more.
whatTheyOffer:
- Free video lessons on thousands of topics
- Practice exercises with instant feedback
- Personalized learning dashboard
- SAT, LSAT, and other test prep (official SAT partnership)
- K-12 math, science, and humanities
- AP course preparation
- College-level courses
howToGetIt:
1. Visit khanacademy.org
2. Create a free account
3. Start learning at your own pace
4. Track progress on personalized dashboard
5. Available on web and mobile apps
keywords: Khan Academy, free tutoring, online learning, math, science, SAT prep, homework help, video lessons, practice exercises
